description: Main front-end component for a Tic Tac Toe game, including game state management, UI rendering, and user interaction handling.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main functional component managing game state and rendering the game UI.

methods.name: handleCellPress
methods.description: Handles user taps on individual cells, updating game state if the move is valid.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the game to its initial state.
